com.uofa.adventure_app.controller

Class StoryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.uofa.adventure_app.controller.StoryController

  • public class StoryController
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps track of the current story, fragement, and keeps a stack of both as well.
    Author:
    Chris Pavlicek
